help_entry.name: ModelAveragedUncorrelatedRelaxedMolecularClock
help_entry.succinct: Implementation of an uncorrelated relaxed molecular clock model with multiple specified distributions
help_entry.verbose: This function describes a relaxed molecular clock model as implemented in 'Model averaging and Bayes factor calculation of relaxed molecular clocks in Bayesian phylogenetics', Li and Drummond, 2011. The rates are sampled as quantiles in an uncorrelated manner. Multiple distributions can be specified
help_entry.author: Wai Lok Sibon Li
